data.name: VergeWorld Demo
data.detailed_description:
Check this new retro shooter!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1640300/Project_Warlock_II/


Check this new action-platformer!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1640320/BIOTA/


Claim this retro platformer for free

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1412170/Janosik/


About the Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
